email_template.name: data_request_data_published
email_template.subject: [Ticket ID: {{ticket_id}}] Data Request from Public Sector Open Data Portal
email_template.content:
Salam Sejahtera,

Your request for data on **{{dataset_title}}** from {{agency}} has been accepted; the datasets you requested are now live on the site.

Please check [your ticket on the Data Request page](https://data.gov.my/data-request?ticket_id={{ticket_id}}) to view the published datasets.

{{live_remark}}

Thank you for helping to improve data.gov.my!

Warm regards,

 ** _Public Sector Open Data Team  
Jabatan Digital Negara, Kementerian Digital_**

email_template.name: data_request_data_published
email_template.subject: [Tiket ID: {{ticket_id}}] Permohonan Set Data dari Portal Data Terbuka Sektor Awam
email_template.content:
Salam sejahtera,

Permohonan anda untuk data bertajuk **{{dataset_title}}** telah diluluskan oleh agensi {{agency}} dan diterbitkan di portal kami.

Anda juga boleh menyemak [tikey and di halaman Permohonan Data](https://data.gov.my/ms-MY/data-request?ticket_id={{ticket_id}}) kami untuk melihat set data yang telah diterbitkan.

{{live_remark}}

Terima kasih kerana membantu meningkatkan data.gov.my!

Sekian, terima kasih.

**_Admin Portal Data Terbuka Sektor Awam  
Jabatan Digital Negara, Kementerian Digital_**
